mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( admin_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_view_cnt, create_date, update_date ) VALUES( #{adminId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, '0', Now(), Now() )
INSERT INTO notice_file ( notice_no, notice_file_name, notice_file_ext, notice_file_size ) VALUES ( #{noticeNo}, #{noticeFileName}, #{noticeFileExt}, #{noticeFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, update_date = NOW() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no, n.admin_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_top, n.notice_content, n.notice_view_cnt, n.create_date, n.update_date, f.notice_file_no, f.notice_file_name, f.notice_file_ext, f.notice_file_size FROM notice n LEFT JOIN notice_file f ON n.notice_no = f.notice_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{noticeNo}
